channel.title: How do i make somebody a admin?
channel.description:
i just made my testscape server through hamachi and im logged in and need to know where to go from there.
i went into my documents found the testscape source clicked characters found my name and seen player rights. but that's only in note pad which i double clicked in my documents. is there a program i need to be in to make it official?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 10:44:36 PM[/size][hr]like what is the correct player rights number do i put in at textpad to make myself a admin?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 10:47:16 PM[/size][hr]well anyways thanks paulT- you have helped me a lot but i think im all done for a little while till tommorow or something lol that was frustrating.
